# Turtleand AI Lab

> A hands-on, 6-module curriculum for building practical LLM tools and agents. Self-paced, free, and open.

## Curriculum

### Module 0: Setup & Safety
- [Agent notifications](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/agent-notifications): Get notified when your agent finishes using hooks and ntfy.
- [Running inference locally](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/running-inference-locally): Easily setup & run an LLM on your own machine.
